testcase.classname: To Validate Add To Cart Feature
testcase.name: To validate product search functionality in flipkart
testcase.system-out: Given User has to launch the browser and flipkart application...............passed When User has to search the product through search box......................passed And User has to select and adding product into cart.........................passed Then User has to close the browser..........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User has to launch the browser and flipkart application...............passed When User has to click login button.........................................passed When User has to enter mobile number in required field......................passed When User has to click request otp button...................................passed
